discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The "},{"type":"text","text":"gamma function","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":" serves as an extension of the factorial function beyond the non-negative integer. And one of the functional equations is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Gamma (s) = (s-1)!"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Therefore, "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\begin{aligned} \left(\frac 12\right) ! & = \Gamma \left(\frac 32\right) & \small \color{#3D99F6} \text{Using the identity: }\Gamma (s+1) = s\Gamma (s)
\\ & = \frac 12 \Gamma \left(\frac 12\right) & \small \color{#3D99F6} \text{Note that }\Gamma \left(\frac 12\right) = \sqrt \pi
\\ & = \frac {\sqrt \pi}2
\\ & = \boxed{0.8862269...} \end{aligned} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

replies.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Not that I know of. Gamma function was devised by Euler to extent the discreet factorial to the continuous. In my opinion one of the greatest contribution by Euler.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Would there be a way to estimate the answer without using the gamma function?

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0.9999999 (keeps on going for ever, recurring) is equal to 1."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Well it's just an Infinite Geometric Progression"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_1 = 9/10"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"common ratio of 1/10"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S= a_1 / 1-r"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S= (9/10) / [1-(1/10)]"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S= (9/10) / [9/10]"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S=1"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
